name: Blood Drive
description: A database that stores blood drive information.  When a drive date passes the program creates a table with information about who donated.

name: Clinic Schedule
description: A user can create a schedule with a button click, as well as chat with the staff.

name: PizzaPizza
description: My partner Jacen and I made an online order system for a restaurant.  We were both inspired by the restaurant we work at.

name: Scan13 Data Table
description: A program that turns JSON data into an HTML table.  This is a small project now used by Scan13.

link.name: Pokedex
link.description: Along with partners Michelle and Dylan, I made a Pokédex with Django.  Users can add and view Pokémon.

link.name: Personal Library
link.description: My partner Richard and I made a personal library.  The library allows the user to make an account, edit the books, and make labels for them.

link.name: Asunder
link.description: For our Unit 1 project, my partner Logan and I made a rogue-like dungeon crawler titled Asunder.  It is a text-based game based loosely on Dante's Inferno.

link.name: Clock
link.description: A working clock that displays the date and time by the second.

link.name: Whack A Walrus
link.description: Click the walrus as many times as you can before the timer runs out.
